channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- undertow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- undertow

item.title: CVE-2020-1757|2024-08-04T06:46:30.881Z -- red%20hat -- undertow
item.description: A flaw was found in all undertow-2.x.x SP1 versions prior to undertow-2.0.30.SP1, all undertow-1.x.x and undertow-2.x.x versions prior to undertow-2.1.0.Final, where the Servlet container causes servletPath to normalize incorrectly by truncating the path after semicolon which may lead to an application mapping resulting in the security bypass.

item.title: CVE-2020-10719|2024-08-04T11:14:14.887Z -- red%20hat -- undertow
item.description: A flaw was found in Undertow in versions before 2.1.1.Final, regarding the processing of invalid HTTP requests with large chunk sizes. This flaw allows an attacker to take advantage of HTTP request smuggling.
